document_data.name: Dragon Trail
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Dragon Trail''' was a route in the [[Cormyr/East Reaches|East Reaches]] of [[Cormyr]] connecting the [[Moonsea Ride]] to the town of [[Hillmarch]] and then to the [[East Way]]. It ran along the southern foothills of the [[Gnoll Peaks]].

The defensive fortification of [[Slingdyke]] overlooked the westernmost point of the trail. As of [[1368 DR]], an inn used to sit at the northeastern point of the trail intersection, across from the fort, but a mysterious royal degree forbade the rebuilding of the place after it burned down. A [[Purple Dragon]] guard station was erected to the east of the ruins.

Across the trail from the ruined inn were its old paddock and stables—complete with a horse pond—which were later used as a free campground for travelers.
